attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is enough voluntary work and community work to be done whilst people are claiming benefits.  Instead of doing nothing at home, people should have to do community type of work,  public gardens ,  help with elderly,  anything .  A fortune could be saved by local govements and authorities, and small business's.
 Instead of 1000's of people sat idle they should ahve to work voluntary,  I feel it would get people of there backsides and if they didn't like the job they were given,  they might search themselves a little bit more to find something they prefer,  if they don't work, top payments

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
